## R Markdown

```{r}
data <- read.BayesANT.data(fasta.file = "../FinBOL_SplitSeq_test.gzip")
model <- BayesANT(data = data)

document()
testDNA <- read.BayesANT.testDNA(fasta.file = "../FinBOL_SplitSeq_test.gzip")
out <- predict(model, DNA = testDNA[1:20], return_probs = T)

```
